Have heard about this game for years and never sat down to play it. Finally in 2021 I've completed the game and have to say I had an absolute blast. Pairs perfectly with your favorite beer or cocktail. Genius level and puzzle design, witty commentary, and just plain fun. I have not played any other game like it, and was sad that I finished the game so quickly! The comments are valid: Just BUY IT!

Le 1 était déjà génial même si le scénario était quand même moins poussé. Le 2 est tout bonnement excellent. Bon scénario, univers et ambiance dystopiques mystérieux, humour, gameplay original et inventif doublé d'ingéniosité, ce cocktail gagnant permet de faire de Portal 2 l'un des meilleurs jeux de tous les temps.

Отличная игра.Я конечно не играл в 1 часть,но думаю когда-нибудь куплю.В этой же части добавили кооператив,теперь играть вдвойне веселей.И даже когда вы пройдете сюжет игры,вы все равно можете поиграть в кооператив.Так же добавили remote play together.А это значит,что один покупает и устанавливает игру,приглашает кого-нибудь из друзей.А друг,не имея самой игры,подключиться к трансляции и играть вместе с другом.Также забыл упомянуть мастерскую,в которой игроки создают свою камеру тестирования.Вообщем хочу сказать,что игра хороша и стоит своих денег.Ставлю этой игре 10/10

muito foda

This game is great and I just love it so much! Single player campagin has amazing story and you'll spend some hours playing it (i can't say how many exactly 'cuz I'm quite slow when it comes to thinking. My first run took me I think 6h [??? maybe more]). There's also multiplayer which I started, but haven't finished yet. But if you are a loner or you're just too afraid to ask someone (by the way... same :') ) there's lots of great community test chambers (there's also co-op test chambers so you can play some with your friend also)! You can also create a test chamber if you're feeling creative.
The only thing that I can complain about is that some things didn't make it to the final game. But I get it. It's hard to make put some things together.
Go on now, buy it if you have an urge to play something like this today, but you can wait for Christmas sale.
loved it
its good

[h1]It's Portal 2. Is there much else I can say about it?[/h1]
I honestly doubt there's much new I could add to the mountain of praise the game deserves, because it really does- the game holds up well even these many years later, and is worth at least one playthrough in one's lifetime.
The most I'll add is just, for anyone new coming in blind- no, you don't [i]need[/i] to have played Portal or the Half-Life series to understand the story and what's going on in Portal 2. It [i]is[/i] a sequel, and certain references and connections will make more sense if you've played those games, but Portal 2 gives enough context and [i]is a puzzle game[/i] enough that you don't need that context in order to play and enjoy the game. 
So [i]play[/i] the game, [i]hear[/i] the bits you can't help but quote, [i]think[/i] with portals, and hope that GLaDOS's funny, rude voice doesn't awaken anything in y-
Bir bulmaca oyunu nasıl bu kadar güzel ve tatlı olabilir

[b]Ein gelungener Nachfolger.[/b] 

[h1] Pro: [/h1] 
- Schöne Story
- Co-op bietet nochmal neue Gameplay-Möglichkeiten
- viele Community Maps

[h1] Kontra: [/h1]  
- Im Einzelspieler brechen manche Dialoge ab, wenn man zu schnell nach vorne stürmt

[h1] Für Erfolgsjäger: [/h1]   
Im Laufe der Story bekommt ihr ca. 50%. Für den Rest müssen in bestimmten Abschnitten des Spiels besondere Herausforderungen gemeistert werden, wie z.B. fange einen blauen Würfel bevor er zu Boden fällt. Nichts unmögliches also. Für einen Co-op Erfolg braucht ihr allerdings drei Freunde, die dieses Spiel spielen und einen nach Abschluss der es noch nie gespielt hat, also sind 100% dann doch nicht so leicht. 


[h1] Fazit[/h1]
Spielt als erstes den Einzelspieler, denn der Multiplayer schließt mit der Geschichte direkt danach an. Story und Kommentare sind bei beiden gut. Das Gameplay ist wie bei eins. Testkammern und Wegsuche außerhalb mit ein paar Neuerungen. Der Co-op Modus ist das Sahnehäubchen schlecht hin. Mir allein, wie auch uns im Co-op, hat es nur Spaß gemacht.

I don't know why I waited so long to play this game. Portal 2 is a strong reminder that shorter games are almost always sweeter. Though you can beat this game in five hours, every second is pure quality. The puzzles are fine tuned to always feel rewarding and the character interactions are just hilarious. It's also just so different from every other puzzle game out there to the point where your brain is pretty much rewired after just a couple hours of playing. By all means worth your time and money if you're in the mood for some challenging puzzles and memorable characters.

An amazing sequel to an already amazing game. It improves are everything from the first game while also introducing new ideas that flow perfectly with gameplay. Love it to bit and highly recommend playing after the first

Muito legal o jogo, ainda melhor que o primeiro, melhoraram em todos os aspectos, mas ao mesmo tempo tudo é familiar pra quem já jogou Portal 1.

Os gráficos são muito bonitos, performance muito boa, e não encontrei bug nenhum, o jogo também é um pouco mais longo que o primeiro, zerei em 12 horas, mas isso só a campanha principal, tem o modo coop e os mods ainda, então dá pra subir bastante esse tempo.

Recomendo bastante, ainda mais que fica bem baratinho em promoção, mas vale o preço full também.
